riddles.comment: These are riddles for a quest in stendhal by the Grim Reaper in Hell.

entry.key: To answer this riddle, repeat - three blind mice, three blind mice

riddles.entry: three blind mice, three blind mice

entry.key: What type of animal is pink and the flesh makes pork and bacon?
How many months there is in a year?
How many months there is in a year?
